programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: A tech whiz loses everything when her startup goes bust and personal life is left in ruins. Discovering that success at her new job depends on becoming a team player in the office and on the company's all-male basketball team, she enlists the help of a basketball-savvy teen to coach her as she desperately attempts to save her job and her future.

programme.title: Sex Trip
programme.desc: After a shallow womanizer refuses a mysterious homeless woman's request for a kiss, he wakes up the next morning to discover he's been changed into a woman.

programme.title: Rottentail
programme.desc: Geeky fertility researcher, Peter Cotton, is bitten by a mutant rabbit and changes into the half-man/half-bunny Rottentail. What's a boy to do? Why, take a hippity-hoppity trip home of course! Peter begins a bloody killing spree of revenge that culminates in his childhood hometown of Easter Falls.

programme.title: The Insider: Reggie Yates
programme.desc: Working inside Guilford County Jail in North Carolina, Reggie helps guard nearly a thousand prisoners whose crimes range from minor misdemeanours to murder.

programme.title: The Breed
programme.desc: A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.

programme.title: Final Draft
programme.desc: An aspiring screenwriter (James Van Der Beek) is faced with a career-altering opportunity to write a new horror script. After isolating himself for days in his apartment to finish the assignment, he starts blending reality with his subconscious, but he is determined to finish: even if it kills him.

programme.title: Celebs on the Ranch
programme.desc: Nine budding cowboys and cowgirls arrive in deepest Arizona at the remote Ranch they will call home. Once unpacked they meet Rancher Rick, the man they need to impress. He’ll judge, set challenges, and decide who must leave the Ranch and who makes it into the Final. The 1st challenge is a Treasure Hunt - a chance for the celebs to work together and meet their 4-legged partner for the stay.

programme.title: Celebs on the Ranch
programme.desc: Despite jetlag, the celebs wake in good spirits and ready for the day. Their 1st challenge - identifying their horse after yesterday’s short intro. Rancher Rick briefs the celebs on grooming and bonding. Later, the celebs learn lassoing - techniques and success rates vary, but they all get into the cowboy spirit. Who will have roped themselves the first horseshoe of the competition?

programme.title: Celebs on the Ranch
programme.desc: Day three begins with the celebs given an additional challenge to work on - the girls are pitched against the boys in a Line-Dance Off. In the Paddock, the celebs are shown how to ‘Tack-Up’ (or Saddle Up) their horses. Eventually, the celebs attempt a group lap of the arena on their four-legged friends. In the evening, the Line Dance-Off brings the house down. But who has won a horseshoe today?

programme.title: Finding Love in Big Sky, Montana
programme.desc: An independent country girl takes on the task of upholding her adored grandfather's ranch. After being denied the funding needed to refurbish the ranch, she is reintroduced to her ex-boyfriend, a big-time marketing executive stationed in Denver. Admitting to herself that she needs the help, Paisley agrees to work with Josh while he is town to come up with ideas on how to raise money for the farm.

programme.title: Farm to Fork to Love
programme.desc: Alice, a young and talented sous chef at NY's top restaurant, receives an invitation to judge a food competition for a prestigious annual fundraiser. Despite the dismay of Bret, her boss who is also her boyfriend, she accepts the invitation. Once she arrives in Kansas, Alice is surprised to find her former boyfriend in college, CHRISTIAN, is amongst the judges.

programme.title: The Penalty
programme.desc: The human cost of the death penalty in America comes in for timely, gripping examination in The Penalty, the vital new documentary from British filmmakers Will Francome & Mark Pizzey (One for Ten). Embedding themselves in the stories of three fascinating people affected by the American capital punishment system, the filmmakers follow the stories of a man wrongly convicted who spent 15 years on death row, a lawyer fighting against increasingly inhumane, botched executions, and a mother battling against the state’s pursuit of the death penalty for her daughter’s murderer. With recent controversial news about executions across the USA, and support for the death penalty at an all-time low, The Penalty is a riveting, forensic examination of the weightiest of issues.

programme.title: Ba'al: The Storm God
programme.desc: A terminally ill archaeologist attempts to cure his cancer by retrieving the ancient amulets of the storm god Ba'al.

programme.title: Earthstorm
programme.desc: A massive asteroid impact on the moon begins causing storms on earth due to the sudden changes in ocean tides. When a further examination is conducted, it's discovered that the moon's structure is now entirely unstable threatening all life on earth. With time running out, a team of scientists turn to one man, demolitions expert John Redding, in an effort to find a solution and secure the moon.

programme.title: Icetastrophe
programme.desc: It's Christmas and everything is quiet in a peaceful town while snow covers every corner. However, the tragedy begins when a terrifying meteorite crashes and threatens to crystallize the entire population.

programme.title: Jurassic Galaxy
programme.desc: In the near future, a spaceship crashes on an unknown planet. Soon they encounter some of their worst fears when they discover that the planet is inhabited by monstrous dinosaurs.
